alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Harris; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Muscogee, northeastern Chattahoochee and southeastern Harris Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Flat Rock, or 9 miles northeast of Columbus, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Bibb City, Upatoi, North Fort Moore, Goat Rock Lake, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, Flat Rock, Highland Park, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Vista Terrace, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Kenwood, Midland, Eelbeck/West Fort Moore, Avondale and Fortson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
